name: Bobs Running training 3D
description:
This game is more awesome than Baldi’s Basics simulator, wow! If you have played our previous education and learning simulator about Baldi’s basics school, you would like our new running simulator more. No calculator and slew mathematical equations this time! Just you and your way, rush through the road and evade obstacles on your way in our new running simulator: Bob’s Running Training 3D. Run away and forget about Baldi’s basics school with it’s calculator and slew mathematical equations just run and jump over obstacles, that’s it! Will you be able to earn more points than your friends will? Run for as long as you can and prove everyone, that you are the best runner.

In this running simulator, you can forget about counting hard mathematical equations from calculator of Baldi’s basics school. This simulator has no education and learning inside, and that is what makes it better than Baldi’s basics simulator. Just run without stopping, evade obstacles on your way. For running you earn points, which sets your place in leaderboard, also you will find tokens on your way, collect those tokens to spend them in our in-game store. You can buy new outfit or several upgrades. Feel free while running, just follow the road and evade obstacles on your way, now you do not have to complete slew mathematical equations and can forget about Baldi’s basics school with its education and learning calculator. Just run and become top one runner in the leaderboard, you can do it, we know it for sure.

Bob’s Running Training 3D is a free to play simulator, which is ten times more awesome than Baldi’s Basics simulator. Forget about slew education and learning tasks, or calculator from this horrific school. Now it is only you and your road, show everyone your runner skills and evade obstacles on your way, become top one runner in the leaderboard, collect tokens and buy new outfit for your runner in our in-game store. Invite your friends to play together and find out who is the fastest runner in the simulator. Forget about Baldi’s basics school, just run and feel free from math. Ready, steady, go!
